41.long: I am strong, mighty, hence: I rule, am master, prevail; I obtain, take hold of; I hold, hold fast.
a little child, an infant, little one.
(denoting speech in progress), (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

41.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
41.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.
I translate (from one language into another), interpret.
a little girl, a young girl; a girl, maiden.
(denoting speech in progress), (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
(a) I wake, arouse, (b) I raise up.

42.brief: I raise up, set up, rise from
42.long: I raise up, set up; I rise from among (the) dead; I arise, appear.
a little girl, a young girl; a girl, maiden.
I walk, hence Hebraistically (in an ethical sense): I conduct my life, live.
twelve; the usual way in which the Twelve apostles of Jesus are referred to.
(lit: I remove from a standing position), (a) in trans. tenses: I astonish, amaze, (b) in intrans. tenses: I am astonished, amazed; I am out of my mind, am mad.
(properly: distraction or disturbance of mind caused by shock), bewilderment, amazement; a trance.
large, great, in the widest sense.

43.long: I give a commission (instructions), order; I admonish, prohibit.

43.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
43.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.

43.brief: I come to know, learn, realize
43.long: I am taking in knowledge, come to know, learn; aor: I ascertained, realized.
(denoting speech in progress), (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
I offer, give; I put, place.

43.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
43.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.
I eat, partake of food; met: I devour, consume (e.g. as rust does); used only in fut. and 2nd aor. tenses.
